Submodules

ui.app_functions module

Module contains class AppFunctions that contains created functions to control application

class ui.app_functions.AppFunctions

Bases: ManipulatorApp.main.MainWindow

Class contains functions to control application depending on users actions

automatic_mode_break()

Delete initialized robotic_arm object

automatic_mode_init()

Create robotic program from read file.

Function checks if installed effector is the same as in read robotic path.

Status is printed in log file/bar.

Returns

self.robotic_arm

automatic_start()

Start executing robotic program till end of program or stop flag.

Function checks robotic arms calibration and execute program depends on set mode- servo/sim.

Status is printed in log file/bar.

automatic_step_next()

Execute one next line of robotic program

Function checks robotic arms calibration and execute one line of program.

Status is printed in log file/bar.

automatic_step_prev()

Execute one previous line of robotic program

Function checks robotic arms calibration and execute one line of program.

Status is printed in log file/bar.

automatic_stop()

Stop executing robotic program and print status in log file/bar.

Returns

self.stop = True

communication_radiobutton()

Set/check the communication with robotic arm (Arduino)

communication_tab()

Set status of communication green/red

effector_tab()

Button functions in effector tab in settings page

page_automatic()

Page - Auto mode of controlling robotic arm

Function handles users actions in automatic mode page

page_fk()

Page - Forward kinematics calculations of robotic arm.

Function checks effector dimensions,takes values from sliders and calculate forward kinematics.

Calculation results are displayed, simulated and status is printed in log file and bar.

Returns

Forward kinematics

page_ik()

Page - Inverse kinematics calculations of robotic arm

Function checks effector dimensions,takes values from sliders and calculate forward kinematics.

Calculation results are displayed, simulated and status is printed in log file and bar.

Returns

Inverse kinematics

page_manual()

Page - Manual mode of controlling robotic arm.

Function checks effector dimensions and robotic arm calibration.

Function calculates servo values from sliders values in servo/xyz mode.

Calculation results are displayed, simulated, send to Arduino and status is printed in log file and bar.

page_settings()

Page - Settings (checks effector and communication)
